newsitem.title: USA: CSX has 961,830 Conrail shares, extends bid.
newsitem.headline: CSX has 961,830 Conrail shares, extends bid.

text.p: CSX Corp said as of January 21, it had received 961,830 Conrail Inc shares in reponse to its tender offer for 20.1 percent of Conrail, and the offer has been extended until 1700 EST/2200 GMT on February 14.
The offer was scheduled to expire at 1700 EST/2200 GMT on January 22, the company said.
CSX has offered to merge with Conrail in a $9.4 billion cash and stock transaction, while spurned bidder Norfolk Southern Corp has offered $10.3 billion in cash.
Shares of Conrail were up three Wednesday at 107.
Earlier today, Norfolk Southern said it amended its cash offer for Conrail to reflect a tender for 8.2 million, or about 9.9 percent, of the railroad's shares.
The move follows Friday's meeting of Conrail shareholders at which they rejected a crucial measure in the merger with CSX Corp.
